name: Popeye the Sailor

info_box.其他:: 此动画分为两季播出，第一季共169集，第二季共51集
info_box.导演:: Jack Kinney, Seymour Kneitel, Gene Deitch, Paul Fennell, Bob Bemiller, Tom McDonald
info_box.制片人:: Jack Kinney, William L. Snyder, Larry Harmon, Gerald Ray, John Halas
info_box.脚本:: Ruben Apodaca, Eli Bauer, Carole Beers, Tony Benedict, Tony Benedict, Warren Bennett, Wesley Bennett, Al Bertino, Irving Dressler, Osmond Evans, Dennis Fraser, Nick George, Joseph Gottlieb, Joe Grant, Tom Hix, Cal Howard, Ken Hultgren, Raymond Jacobs, Dick Kinney, Jack Kinney, Isadore Klein, Seymour Kneitel, Seymour Kneitel, Jack Miller, Cliff Millsap, Gerald Nevius, Ed Nofziger, Rosemary O'Connor, Al Pross, Harry Reeves, Edwin Rehberg, Jim Rivind, Milt Schaffer, Walter Schmidt, Howard A. Schneider, Charles Shows, Joe Siracusa, Irv Spector, Joseph Stewart, Harvey Toombs, Noel Tucker, Ralph Wright
info_box.音乐:: Ken Lowman, Winston Sharples, Stepán Konícek
info_box.配音:: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Jackson Beck
info_box.制作:: Larry Harmon Pictures, Rembrandt Films, Halas and Batchelor, Gerald Ray Studios, Jack Kinney Productions, Paramount Cartoon Studios, Corona Cinematografica

summary: 这是所有70后80后的中国孩子童年的集体回忆。波派是一个水手，和女友奥莉弗开心的生活在一起。波派和奥莉弗的幸福生活引起了坏蛋的布鲁托的嫉妒，他千方百计要将奥莉弗抢走。于是，每一集中布鲁托总是想尽办法来抢奥莉弗，每每在他即将得手的时候，波派总能得到他的救命符——菠菜。只要吃了菠菜，波派就能变得力大无穷，布鲁托的亦会随之被无敌的波派制服！

user_intros.name: Popeye the Sailor / 大力水手

complaints: 童年补标，为了变成大力水手而吃菠菜的岁月回不来了
童年经典太多了，画面没有现在精细，人物形象却深入人心，几乎是不会忘的那种
没有什么事情是一罐菠菜解决不了的，如果有，那就来两罐！
